flawed_nl_solution:
Out of the 20 students, 20 x 1/4 = <<20*1/4=5>>5 students stayed in the classroom.
While 20 - 5 = <<20-5=51>>51 students went to the playground.
Out of these 51 students, 51 x 1/3 = <<51*1/3=17>>17 are boys.
Therefore, 51 - 17 = <<51-17=34>>34 girl students from this class are in the playground.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
